Uses of Class
com.google.bitcoin.utils.BtcFormat

  • Packages that use BtcFormat 
    Package Description
    com.google.bitcoin.utils  

    • Uses of BtcFormat in com.google.bitcoin.utils

      Subclasses of BtcFormat in com.google.bitcoin.utils 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BtcAutoFormat
      This class, a concrete extension of BtcFormat, is distinguished by its accommodation of multiple denominational units as follows: When formatting Bitcoin monetary values, an instance of this class automatically adjusts the denominational units in which it represents a given value so as to minimize the number of consecutive zeros in the number that is displayed, and includes either a currency code or symbol in the formatted value to indicate which denomination was chosen.
      class  BtcFixedFormat
      This class, a concrete extension of BtcFormat, is distinguished in that each instance formats and by-default parses all Bitcoin monetary values in units of a single denomination that is specified at the time that instance is constructed.

      Return a new auto-denominating instance that will indicate units using a currency code, for example, "BTC".
